SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, b.CODE_NM as BBS_TY_CODE_NM, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, c.CODE_NM as BBS_ATTRB_CODE_NM, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM lettnbbsmaster a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM lettccmmndetailcode WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM lettccmmndetailcode WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.USE_AT = #useAt#
a.BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchWrd#,'%')
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT a.BBS_ID, a.BBS_TY_CODE, b.CODE_NM as BBS_TY_CODE_NM, a.BBS_INTRCN, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE, c.CODE_NM as BBS_ATTRB_CODE_NM, a.BBS_NM, a.TMPLAT_ID, d.TMPLAT_NM, d.TMPLAT_COURS, a.FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT, a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_NUMBER, a.ATCH_POSBL_FILE_SIZE, a.REPLY_POSBL_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, e.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM, a.USE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,(SELECT IFNULL(USE_AT,'N') FROM lettnbbsuse WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# ) as AUTH_FLAG FROM lettnbbsmaster a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM lettccmmndetailcode WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM lettccmmndetailcode WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM009' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN lettntmplatinfo d ON a.TMPLAT_ID = d.TMPLAT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN comvnusermaster e ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = e.MBER_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId#
